title: CrudEngine
subtitle: The Trust Layer for Zgent Factory
author: COO
description: Executive technical walkthrough of CrudEngine -- the lifecycle management layer that gives Gas Town agents reliable, observable, auditable configuration management across all 7 Claude Code artifact types.
narrativeArc: The presentation frames the scaling problem (manual config fails at 20+ agents), introduces CrudEngine as the solution (unified CRUD with full observability), and demonstrates the business value (audit trail, versioning, real-time events). The deeper point: CrudEngine is not just a tool -- it is the trust layer that must be bulletproof before Zgents go production.
